perturbation.original_text: Equidata provides certain personal credit, fraud detection, credit scoring services and credit monitoring for consumers, the (“Services”). Marketing Affiliate and Equidata wish to enter into an agreement under which Marketing Affiliate may market the Services.
perturbation.changed_text: Equidata provides certain personal credit, fraud detection, credit scoring services and credit monitoring for consumers, the (“Services”). Marketing Affiliate and Equidata wish to enter into an agreement under which Marketing Associate may market the Products.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'Affiliate' to 'Associate' and 'Services' to 'Products' introduces uncertainty as to whether these terms are interchangeable or distinct, potentially affecting the scope of the marketing agreement.

perturbation.original_text: Compensation. Marketing Affiliate shall be responsible for collecting all amounts due directly from the Consumer and shall bear sole responsibility for non-payment of any fees charged to the Consumer. Marketing Affiliate shall pay to Equidata, as compensation for its providing of Services under this agreement, such amounts as outlined and detailed in Exhibit A attached hereto. Such amounts shall be billed on a bi-monthly basis by Equidata and are due and payable in full by Marketing Affiliate 30 days from the invoice date.
perturbation.changed_text: Compensation. Marketing Partner shall be responsible for collecting all amounts due directly from the Customer and shall bear shared responsibility for non-payment of any fees charged to the Customer. Marketing Affiliate shall pay to Equidata, as compensation for its providing of Services under this agreement, such amounts as outlined and detailed in Exhibit A attached hereto. Such amounts shall be billed on a monthly basis by Equidata and are due and payable in full by Marketing Affiliate 60 days from the invoice date.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'Affiliate' to 'Partner', 'Consumer' to 'Customer', 'sole responsibility' to 'shared responsibility', 'bi-monthly' to 'monthly', and '30 days' to '60 days' creates multiple contradictions related to payment responsibilities and timelines, potentially leading to disputes.

perturbation.original_text: Non-solicitation of Clients. Marketing Affiliate shall not directly or indirectly solicit an existing business customer of Equidata during the term and condition of this Agreement other than for joint marketing purposes. Further, Marketing Affiliate shall not market similar products from competing companies on any Web Site Landing Page containing the Equidata or Marketing Affiliate Web link as long as this Agreement is in effect.
perturbation.changed_text: Non-solicitation of Customers. Marketing Vendor shall not directly or indirectly solicit an existing business client of Equidata during the duration of this Agreement other than for marketing partnerships. Further, Marketing Affiliate shall not market similar products from competing firms on any Web Presence Initial Page containing the Equidata or Marketing Affiliate Web link as long as this Agreement is active.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'Clients' to 'Customers', 'Affiliate' to 'Vendor', 'customer' to 'client', 'term and condition' to 'duration', 'joint marketing purposes' to 'marketing partnerships', 'companies' to 'firms', 'Web Site Landing Page' to 'Web Presence Initial Page', and 'in effect' to 'active' introduces multiple inconsistencies that could change the scope and enforcement of the non-solicitation clause.
